data.comment: The match has started.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in M´gladbach.
Union Berlin needs to be cautious. M´gladbach have an attacking throw-in.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
In the minute 4, Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 8, Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Union Berlin.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Union Berlin.
Tobias Stieler awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
M´gladbach have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Monchengladbach.
Tobias Stieler signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Free kick Union Berlin.
In the minute 11, At Borussia-Park, Ramy Bensebaini has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 16, Taiwo Awoniyi of Union Berlin gets in a strike, but is off target.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Tobias Stieler awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
In the minute 18, In Monchengladbach M´gladbach drive forward through Alassane Plea. His shot is on target but it's saved.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 20, Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Union Berlin's half?
Union Berlin's Sheraldo Becker breaks free at Borussia-Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Union Berlin.
Tobias Stieler awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Union Berlin have a goal kick.
Tobias Stieler signals a throw-in for Union Berlin, close to M´gladbach's area.
Throw-in for Union Berlin close to the penalty box.
In the minute 26, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Union Berlin's Sheraldo Becker misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach's Marcus Thuram is whistled for offside at Borussia-Park.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 31, Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Union Berlin have a dangerous throw-in.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 34, In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Alassane Plea (M´gladbach) strikes at Borussia-Park but his header is cleared.
In the minute 38, Matthias Ginter for the home team is judged to be offside.
Jonas Hofmann for M´gladbach drives towards goal at Borussia-Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
M´gladbach are pushing forward but Jonas Hofmann's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 39, Union Berlin have a goal kick.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
In the minute 41, Tobias Stieler awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 44, Union Berlin are coming forward and Sheraldo Becker gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Tobias Stieler signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
In the minute 45, At Borussia-Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tobias Stieler blows to end the first-half.
Tobias Stieler has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Union Berlin in the half of M´gladbach.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 48, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alassane Plea (M´gladbach) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lars Stindl (M´gladbach) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 51, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Nico Schlotterbeck's header is off-target for Union Berlin.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 55, M´gladbach's Matthias Ginter is on target but unsuccessful.
Union Berlin drive forward but Taiwo Awoniyi is judged offside.
Union Berlin will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from M´gladbach.
In the minute 56, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Goal! A Marcus Thuram header gives M´gladbach a 1-0 lead in Monchengladbach.
That's a fine assist from Jonas Hofmann.
In the minute 57, Union Berlin make their first substitution with Marcus Ingvartsen replacing Sheraldo Becker.
Free kick Union Berlin.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Max Kruse is replacing Taiwo Awoniyi for the away team.
In Monchengladbach M´gladbach's Lars Stindl is caught offside.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Union Berlin have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 60, Tobias Stieler awards the home team a throw-in.
Attention is being given to M´gladbach’s Jonas Hofmann and play has been suspended briefly.
M´gladbach's Jonas Hofmann looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 64, Alassane Plea of M´gladbach is pulled up for offside.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Union Berlin's half?
Union Berlin's Christopher Trimmel has been booked in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
In the minute 68, Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Robert Andrich fires in a strike for Union Berlin.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 69, M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Marcus Thuram with Oscar Wendt.
In the minute 72, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Union Berlin close to the penalty box.
Tobias Stieler signals a throw-in for Union Berlin, close to M´gladbach's area.
The away team have replaced Christopher Trimmel with Julian Ryerson. This is the third substitution made today by Urs Fischer.
Union Berlin are pushing forward but Christopher Lenz's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
In the minute 74, Urs Fischer (Union Berlin) is making a fourth substitution, with Cedric Teuchert replacing Marius Bulter.
In the minute 75, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Hannes Wolf is replacing Alassane Plea for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Union Berlin to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 79, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Nico Schlotterbeck (Union Berlin) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Borussia-Park.
Marcus Ingvartsen with an assist there.
Free kick in a good position for Union Berlin!
Union Berlin push forward at Borussia-Park and Marcus Ingvartsen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined M´gladbach defence.
In the minute 82, Julian Ryerson of Union Berlin gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tobias Stieler awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Hannes Wolf (M´gladbach) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Union Berlin drives forward and Cedric Teuchert gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 85, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Marco Rose is making the team's third substitution at Borussia-Park with Patrick Herrmann replacing Florian Neuhaus.
In the minute 86, In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Union Berlin.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
In the minute 89, Throw-in high up the field for Union Berlin in Monchengladbach.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Sebastian Griesbeck is on a sub for Grischa Promel for Union Berlin.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Union Berlin.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
M´gladbach's Ramy Bensebaini misses with an attempt on goal.
Tobias Stieler awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Union Berlin have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Robert Andrich (Union Berlin) has received a yellow card from Tobias Stieler.
